participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and optimistic, Emily is excited about her growing family and new home.
participant_1.background: i work at a school. i am expecting triplets in three months. i just moved into my first home. i recently moved to this country. a already have a step children.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Determined and energetic, James is passionate about fitness and helping others achieve their goals.
participant_2.background: i'm a cancer survivor. i love running and preparing for marathons. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i am a clean eater. my parents were both very athletic.
